item.title: Ziggurat
item.description: feat. Baron and Detective Raul, from @Bluescat227 “The Ziggurat” is the part of Noshem where the intelligence and analyst clerks work. The building and mural is pretty typical of Vekllei civic monumentalism. Noshem is the Commonwealth Intelligence Service, a sprawling and well-resourced organisation with a reputation for deception and zealotry.
item.content:encoded:
feat. Baron and Detective Raul, from @Bluescat227

“The Ziggurat” is the part of Noshem where the intelligence and analyst clerks work. The building and mural is pretty typical of Vekllei civic monumentalism.

Noshem is the Commonwealth Intelligence Service, a sprawling and well-resourced organisation with a reputation for deception and zealotry.
